material.mattext: Based on the Minitab output, state the test statistic, interpret its value, and show how it was found.
The sample mean for the 71 two-seater automobiles is 20.380. We also know that μ = 20 and σ = 4.7. The test statistic can therefore be found using this equation:
A test statistic of 0.68 means that the sample mean is less than one standard deviation above the null value.
